Docs.remarks: A parse error will result, for example, if file path separators are found in the parsed value.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.CommandLine.Parsing.ParseResult Parse (this System.CommandLine.Argument argument, string commandLine);
.method public static hidebysig class System.CommandLine.Parsing.ParseResult Parse(class System.CommandLine.Argument argument, string commandLine) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function Parse (argument As Argument, commandLine As String) As ParseResult
static member Parse : System.CommandLine.Argument * string -> System.CommandLine.Parsing.ParseResult

Docs.param: The argument to use to parse the command line input.
A command line string to parse, which can include spaces and quotes equivalent to what can be entered into a terminal.
Docs.summary: Parses a command line string value using an argument.
Docs.returns: A parse result describing the outcome of the parse operation.
Docs.remarks: The command line string input will be split into tokens as if it had been passed on the command line.
